body.raw:
### Target

The installation tab is used for simple and quick implementation of various packages. The setup process is described, which includes ready-made sample code snippets. The materials collected here will help you save time, which you do not have to waste creating another project.The environment for your new project will be easily prepared according to your skills.

### Support

New resources will be added in the future along with new techniques.

--- 

Use the <MDXLink href="/resources">resources</MDXLink>,it includes good technics, which you can use in your future projects.

If you want to use ready components check <MDXLink href="/components">Components</MDXLink>.

body.raw:
### Przeznaczenie

Zakładka instalacje służy do prostej i szybkiej implementacji różnych pakietów. Opisany jest proces konfiguracji, który zawiera gotowe przykładowe fragmenty kodu. Materiały tutaj zgromadzone pomogą ci zaoszczędzić czas, którego nie musisz marnować tworząc kolejny projekt.Środowisko do twojego nowego projektu przygotujesz według twoich udogodnień.

### Wsparcie

Nowe materiały będą dodawane w przyszłości wraz z nowymi technikami.

--- 

Skorzystaj z <MDXLink href="/resources">Poradników</MDXLink>, zawierają dobre techniki, które możesz wykorzystać w twoich projektach.

Jeżeli chcesz skorzystać z gotowych komponentów zobacz zakładkę <MDXLink href="/components">Komponenty</MDXLink>.

title: Next.js 13
description: Instaling fullstack framework based on React.

body.raw:
### Installation

<CopyInput value="create next-app" />

Recommended installation 

```cli
What is your project named?  [app name]
Would you like to use TypeScript?  Yes
Would you like to use ESLint?  Yes
Would you like to use Tailwind CSS?  Yes
Would you like to use `src/` directory?  Yes
Would you like to use App Router? (recommended)  Yes
Would you like to customize the default import alias?  No
```

title: Next.js 13
description: Instalacja fullstack frameworku opartego na React.

body.raw:
### Instalacja

<CopyInput value="create next-app" />

Zalecana instalacja 

```cli
What is your project named?  [app name]
Would you like to use TypeScript?  Yes
Would you like to use ESLint?  Yes
Would you like to use Tailwind CSS?  Yes
Would you like to use `src/` directory?  Yes
Would you like to use App Router? (recommended)  Yes
Would you like to customize the default import alias?  No
```

title: Komponenty Shadcn.
description: Instalacja biblioteki koponentów opartej na tailwindcss.

body.raw:
### Instalacja

<CopyInput value="npx shadcn-ui@latest init" />

Konfigurujemy według instrukcji.

Aby zainstalować komponenty najlepszym sposoben jest wpisanie polecenia.

Wybieramy komponenty które chcemy użyć w naszym projekcie.

<CopyInput value="pnpm dlx shadcn-ui@latest add" />

  <CodePreviewTab code>
   ```js
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";

const useRects = ({
  ref,
}: {
  ref: React.RefObject<HTMLDivElement>;
}): [DOMRect | null, () => void] => {
  const [rects, setRects] = useState<DOMRect | null>(
    ref.current?.getBoundingClientRect()
      ? ref.current.getBoundingClientRect()
      : null
  );

  const loadRects = () => {
    if (ref.current?.getBoundingClientRect().width)
      setRects(ref.current.getBoundingClientRect());
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    loadRects();
    window.addEventListener("resize", loadRects);

    return () => {
      window.removeEventListener("resize", loadRects);
    };
  }, [ref.current]);
  return [rects, loadRects];
};

export default useRects;
```

  <CodePreviewTab code>
   ```js
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";

const useRects = ({
  ref,
}: {
  ref: React.RefObject<HTMLDivElement>;
}): [DOMRect | null, () => void] => {
  const [rects, setRects] = useState<DOMRect | null>(
    ref.current?.getBoundingClientRect()
      ? ref.current.getBoundingClientRect()
      : null
  );

  const loadRects = () => {
    if (ref.current?.getBoundingClientRect().width)
      setRects(ref.current.getBoundingClientRect());
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    loadRects();
    window.addEventListener("resize", loadRects);

    return () => {
      window.removeEventListener("resize", loadRects);
    };
  }, [ref.current]);
  return [rects, loadRects];
};

export default useRects;
```

   ```js
import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from "react";

const useTimer = (initialState = 0) => {
  const [elapsedTime, setElapsedTime] = useState(initialState);
  const [isRunning, setIsRunning] = useState(false);
  const [startedDate, setStartedDate] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const countRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
  const [checkpoint, setCheckpoint] = useState<number[] | null>(null);
  const [tran, setTran] = useState<number[] | null>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (startedDate && isRunning && !checkpoint) {
      countRef.current = setInterval(() => {
        const endTime = Date.now();
        const timeElapsed = endTime - startedDate;
        setElapsedTime(timeElapsed);
      }, 1);
      setIsRunning(true);
    }
    if (startedDate && isRunning && tran) {
      countRef.current = setInterval(() => {
        const endTime = Date.now();
        const timeElapsed = endTime - startedDate - tran.reduce((a, b) => b+a, 0);
        setElapsedTime(timeElapsed);
      }, 1);
      setIsRunning(true);
    }

    return () => {
      countRef.current && clearInterval(countRef.current);
    };
  }, [startedDate, isRunning]);

  const handleStart = () => {
    if (checkpoint) {
      setTran((prev) => {
        if (prev) {
          return [...prev, Date.now() - checkpoint[checkpoint.length - 1]];
        } else {
          return checkpoint.map((item) => Date.now() - item);
        }
      });
    }
    setIsRunning(true);
    if (!startedDate) setStartedDate(Date.now());
  };

  const handlePause = () => {
    setIsRunning(false);
    countRef.current && clearInterval(countRef.current);
    setCheckpoint((prev) => {
      if (prev) {
        return [...prev, Date.now()];
      } else {
        return [Date.now()];
      }
    });
  };

  const handleReset = () => {
    setIsRunning(false);
    setElapsedTime(0);
    countRef.current && clearInterval(countRef.current);
    setStartedDate(null);
    setCheckpoint(null);
    setTran(null);
  }

  const handleSet = (time: number) => {
    setElapsedTime(time);
    setStartedDate(Date.now()-time);
    setCheckpoint(null);
    setTran(null);
  }

  return { elapsedTime, isRunning, handleStart, handlePause,handleReset,handleSet };
};

export default useTimer;
```

  <CodePreviewTab code>
   ```js
import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from "react";

const useTimer = (initialState = 0) => {
  const [elapsedTime, setElapsedTime] = useState(initialState);
  const [isRunning, setIsRunning] = useState(false);
  const [startedDate, setStartedDate] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const countRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null);
  const [checkpoint, setCheckpoint] = useState<number[] | null>(null);
  const [tran, setTran] = useState<number[] | null>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (startedDate && isRunning && !checkpoint) {
      countRef.current = setInterval(() => {
        const endTime = Date.now();
        const timeElapsed = endTime - startedDate;
        setElapsedTime(timeElapsed);
      }, 1);
      setIsRunning(true);
    }
    if (startedDate && isRunning && tran) {
      countRef.current = setInterval(() => {
        const endTime = Date.now();
        const timeElapsed = endTime - startedDate - tran.reduce((a, b) => b+a, 0);
        setElapsedTime(timeElapsed);
      }, 1);
      setIsRunning(true);
    }

    return () => {
      countRef.current && clearInterval(countRef.current);
    };
  }, [startedDate, isRunning]);

  const handleStart = () => {
    if (checkpoint) {
      setTran((prev) => {
        if (prev) {
          return [...prev, Date.now() - checkpoint[checkpoint.length - 1]];
        } else {
          return checkpoint.map((item) => Date.now() - item);
        }
      });
    }
    setIsRunning(true);
    if (!startedDate) setStartedDate(Date.now());
  };

  const handlePause = () => {
    setIsRunning(false);
    countRef.current && clearInterval(countRef.current);
    setCheckpoint((prev) => {
      if (prev) {
        return [...prev, Date.now()];
      } else {
        return [Date.now()];
      }
    });
  };

  const handleReset = () => {
    setIsRunning(false);
    setElapsedTime(0);
    countRef.current && clearInterval(countRef.current);
    setStartedDate(null);
    setCheckpoint(null);
    setTran(null);
  }

  const handleSet = (time: number) => {
    setElapsedTime(time);
    setStartedDate(Date.now()-time);
    setCheckpoint(null);
    setTran(null);
  }

  return { elapsedTime, isRunning, handleStart, handlePause,handleReset,handleSet };
};

export default useTimer;
```
